Package game.monsters

Class FlyingMonster

java.lang.Object
game.monsters.Monster
game.monsters.FlyingMonster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Purchaseable
public class FlyingMonster extends Monster
A special type of Monster, with a fly move, that allows them to not take damage in the next turn.

      startLevel - int. The monster's starting level.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomName

      public static String getRandomName()
      Generates a random name for FlyingMonster type monsters.
      Returns:
      String. A random name for a FlyingMonster.

    • dealDamageToSelf

      public String dealDamageToSelf(int damageDealt)
      Overides the base class method, ignoring the damage and returning a String describing such if flying, else calling the base class method.
      Overrides:
      dealDamageToSelf in class Monster
      Parameters:
      damageDealt - int. The damage to deal to this monster.
      Returns:
      String. A description of the effects of the damage (damage increase and if fainted it describes the faint).

    • preTurnLogic

      public ArrayList<String> preTurnLogic()
      Carries out base class pre turn logic, and then set's isFlying to false, so flying only last's through one enemy attack.
      Overrides:
      preTurnLogic in class Monster
      Returns:
      ArrayList. A list messages summarising the actions performed.

    • makeMove

      public String makeMove(int move, Monster enemy)
      Makes fly move if move is 1, else calls base class method
      Overrides:
      makeMove in class Monster
      Parameters:
      move - int. The move to perform (should be an index of attack strings)
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster to perform the move against.
      Returns:
      String. A message summarising the move for display purpases.

    • makeRandomMove

      public String makeRandomMove(Monster enemy)
      Randomly makes fly move or base class attack, with 50% chance
      Overrides:
      makeRandomMove in class Monster
      Parameters:
      enemy - Monster. The enemy monster
